nodes.bodyText: Should we do empty checks before returning these values? StringUtils.isBlank catches null, blank, or all whitespace. If the title is present but empty, we'd want to fall back to the other options
you can use StringUtils.isBlank in place of these two checks (the apache commons lang3 version)
This statement probably isn't accurate anymore. Maybe we can remove this warning, assuming the indexing part works correctly?
